txt.en: 'Here they come again!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Moans come from the east edge of Weathertop.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: With the flames all on, a large fire erupts in the south-east.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: The cairn has been disturbed, but its owner will only approach in darkness.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: With only the central fire lit, Gwathrengor has arrived!</rgb>
The south-east camp-fire has burned out.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Candaith calls out, 'Half-way there, we only need four more.'</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Gwandir roars, 'That is my bow!'</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Perhaps a little fire would awake this sleeping wood troll</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Gúgaw's Arm has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
'The shadows grow dark. This will be their final push! To arms!'

'Thank goodness you are here. We heard from Rivendell that Gandalf the Grey had battled the Ringwraiths upon this very hill, and now servants of the Witch-king have been drawn here.\n\n'The minions of Angmar have come already to Amon Sûl. I have laid a trap for them, but I fear this will be a foe beyond my strength alone.'

'You have done a remarkable thing here today. Few in Middle-earth can claim to have faced a Cargûl, let alone defeated it in battle. This will serve as an important blow to the Enemy. Today was a good day.'
The south-west camp-fire has burned out.
The Enemy has begun to march
<rgb=#00FF00>The first assault has been repelled. There are but a few quick moments before the Enemy will try again</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The second assault has been pushed back. You have a few moments before the next arrives</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Golnauk has fallen to your mighty blow.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The third assault has been repelled. The Cargûl now enters</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Growling and a snarl come from the north edge of Weathertop.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The Cargûl has been vanquished, and Candaith has survived to carry word to Rivendell</rgb>
North-west edge of Weathertop
<rgb=#FF0000>Candaith has been defeated</rgb>

Servants of the Witch-king have been drawn to Weathertop following a confrontation between the Nazgûl and the Wizard Gandalf the Grey. The Ranger Candaith has laid a trap to defeat the Cargûl who leads the dark forces to the ruins of Amon Sûl.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Shrieking comes from the darkness to the east.</rgb>
The east camp-fire has burned out.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Urkflagít awakes and roars in pain as he is engulfed in flames.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Laimbenn has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
North-east edge of Weathertop
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Bloodwing has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Norgol has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
Inform Candaith that you have arrived
Push back the first assault
Push back the second assault
'It is quiet. We have a few moments. Gather your wits.'
Push back the third assault
'Their numbers wane, but I fear we are not yet through the last of them. For a moment we can rest, though.'
South-east edge of Weathertop
Defeat the Cargûl
'Let the foulness that leads this assault come forth and meet its end!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Mokum has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Candaith yells out, 'We have been tricked, be on your guard!'</rgb>
Candaith must survive the assault
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A flickering comes from the south-east.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A glint in the cairn catches your eye.</rgb>
'Today was a good victory. I could not have done it without your aid, thank you.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Snoring echoes from the north-west corner of Weathertop.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Gwathrengor has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
South-west edge of Weathertop
Candaith has been preparing the defences on the peak of Weathertop. Speak with him to confirm the plan for defeating the impending assault.
The first assault has begun. The Enemy will stop at nothing to destroy Candaith and reclaim what they lost.
The second assault has begun. Dark and powerful forces are at play.
The third assault has begun. The Enemy's power is waning under the strain of sustaining this unnatural attack.
The leader of the Enemy's forces and architect of this attack has finally made his appearance on the battlefield. Defeat this servant of the Nine.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Gúgaw's arm appears, eager to avenge its body's death!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Feet shuffle softly in the night to the south.</rgb>
The north-west camp-fire has burned out.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: An inhuman wail sounds out across the peak of Weathertop.</rgb>
'The darkness has encroached far, can you feel it deadening your limbs?'
'Here they come!'
'I have added herbs to these camp-fires. If you light them, it will fight back against the darkness and return some of your battle prowess.'
'Grab a torch, light the fires, keep them from going out, and we may yet win this battle.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Candaith calls out, 'The athelas has bloomed, quickly grab it all up.'</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Urkflagít has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
The north camp-fire has burned out.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: This was a little one, a larger flame would attract a larger limrafn.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Gwandir has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: Candaith calls out, 'Now quickly, pitch them into the fire!'</rgb>
Stand at Amon Sûl
